page.title: 01S/E of disused lead mine
page.content: Pibble: The area covered is mainly uncultivated moorland and heath supporting sheep and beef cattle.There is one house in the square, Arkland, which is a small sheep farm, the remains of a lead mine are still to be seen on Pibble Hill. The old military road from Creetown to Skyreburn passes through the southern part of the square. This used to be a track with grass growing up the middle but since the BBC opened up a TV Station on Cambret Hill, it has since been tarred, probably about 12-15 years ago.
